definition: mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: Does he really think I wronged him?
sentences.chinese: 他真以爲我錯怪了他嗎？

sentences.english: After he bail mei after of reproach know blamed may explain beginning splendor.
sentences.chinese: 玥保釋梅後責備之，後經榮解釋始知錯怪梅。

sentences.english: Dimitri apologized to Aleko for having accused him.
sentences.chinese: 向阿列科道了歉，說是錯怪了他。

sentences.english: Now, if they had but known it, they had been wronging Tilbury all the time.
sentences.chinese: 他們並不知道自己完全錯怪了提爾伯裏。

sentences.english: I apologized to her, for I had wronged her.
sentences.chinese: 我向她道歉，因爲我錯怪她了。

sentences.english: He was unjustly blamed by his immediate supperior.
sentences.chinese: 他受到頂頭上司的錯怪。

sentences.english: I apologized to her , for I had wronged her.
sentences.chinese: 我向她道歉了，因爲我錯怪了她。

sentences.english: I am sorry to have wronged you.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，原來是我錯怪你了。

sentences.english: I regretted having blamed her unjustly.
"So I have blamed the young man wrong, "he thought.
sentences.chinese: “看來是我錯怪這個青年了，”他想。

sentences.english: Let us not blame these poor children.
sentences.chinese: 不要錯怪這些無辜的孩子們。

sentences.english: You could be mistaken about them!
He had been wrong about the wolf.
I am sorry, I was mistaken about you.

definition: to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
lit. to work like an ox, to work like a horse; fig. to work extremely hard
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
old: to reap the consequences of one's words (idiom, from Mencius); modern: to go back on one's word/to blow hot and cold/to contradict oneself/inconsistent
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5
